platforms.name: Consensus
platforms.description: Consensus is an AI-powered search engine designed specifically for scientific research. It uses large language models (LLMs) to read, extract, and synthesize findings directly from peer-reviewed academic papers, allowing users to ask research questions in plain English and get evidence-based answers with citations. It uniquely focuses on providing consensus-level insights by analyzing multiple studies, making it a powerful tool for students, researchers, and professionals who need to quickly understand the scientific landscape on a topic.
keyFeatures: Plain-language querying of scientific database (e.g., 'Does creatine improve memory?')
Instant extraction of key findings and 'yes/no' consensus from papers
One-click generation of evidence-based summaries synthesizing multiple sources

platforms.name: Artifact 2.0
platforms.description: Artifact 2.0 is a personalized AI research assistant that helps users deeply explore and understand complex topics. It uses large language models (LLMs) to summarize, cross-reference, and analyze information from a wide array of news and web sources, presenting findings in a clean, ad-free interface. Its unique value lies in transforming the overwhelming flow of online information into structured, verified, and actionable knowledge, moving beyond simple news aggregation to become a tool for serious inquiry.
keyFeatures: AI-powered deep dives that generate comprehensive summaries and analyses on any user-queryable topic
Multi-source cross-referencing to verify facts and present diverse perspectives within a single view
Project-based organization allowing users to save articles, notes, and AI insights into dedicated research folders

platforms.name: Artifact 2.0
platforms.description: Artifact 2.0 is a personalized AI research assistant that transforms how users consume and analyze information. It allows users to ask questions on any topic, and the AI will summarize, cross-reference, and synthesize insights from a vast library of articles and papers to provide a clear, multi-perspective answer. It uniquely moves beyond simple news aggregation to become an interactive tool for deep understanding, targeting professionals, students, and lifelong learners who need to quickly grasp complex subjects.
keyFeatures: Ask Questions & Get AI-Powered Summaries: Pose a question and receive a concise, sourced summary pulling from multiple articles.
Multi-Source Cross-Referencing: Automatically finds and cites multiple sources on the same topic to provide balanced context.
Save & Organize Insights with 'Highlights': Save key points from any summary or article into a personal library organized by topic.

platforms.name: Tavily Research Agent
platforms.description: Tavily is an AI-powered research assistant that autonomously conducts deep, multi-source internet research to answer complex queries. It synthesizes information from diverse sources, generates comprehensive reports with citations, and is designed for professionals who need fast, reliable insights. Its unique value lies in its agentic workflow that goes beyond simple search by planning, executing, and synthesizing multiple queries to produce a coherent, sourced answer.
keyFeatures: Autonomous multi-query research agent that plans and executes a search strategy
Synthesis of information from up to 10+ sources per query into a coherent answer
Automatic citation generation with source links for fact verification

platforms.name: Voyager 2
platforms.description: Voyager 2 is Symbolica's flagship autonomous AI research agent designed to accelerate the scientific workflow. It autonomously navigates academic literature, reasons over complex technical PDFs (including mathematical notation), executes code for data analysis, and drafts structured research papers. It uniquely combines retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) with code execution in a persistent agent framework, targeting researchers, analysts, and R&D teams who need to synthesize information and generate technical content at scale.
keyFeatures: Autonomous, multi-step research on arXiv, PubMed, and other databases with source citation
High-fidelity parsing and reasoning over technical PDFs with LaTeX math rendering
Integrated Python/R code interpreter for executing data analysis and generating figures
